a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Consumption-based vs. production-based COâ‚‚ emissions per capita,
Consumption-based emissions are national emissions that have been adjusted for trade. This measures fossil fuel and industry
emissions. Land use change is not included.
Data source: OWID based on Global Carbon Project
